config.darkness.title: 真實黑暗配置
config.darkness.help.block_light_only: Areas lit by sky will not be fully dark
config.darkness.help.ignore_moon_phase: 即使滿月，夜晚亮度仍為最暗
config.darkness.help.dark_default: Enable in modded dimensions with a sky
config.darkness.help.dark_skyless: Enable in modded dimensions with no sky
